remark.p: Non-career appointee. Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary/Consul General Envoys Extraordinary and Ministers Plenipotentiary/Consuls General (Yugoslavia); Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary/Consul General Envoys Extraordinary and Ministers Plenipotentiary/Consuls General (Romania); Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary/Consul General Envoys Extraordinary and Ministers Plenipotentiary/Consuls General (Greece).
